article_title: Boeing Striving to Improve Profit Margins
article_text:
The head of Boeing Co. said Wednesday the company is trying to improve profit margins at both its commercial and defense arms, and predicted possible order announcements at next week's Singapore Airshow.

Boeing Chief Executive Jim McNerney said the company aims to improve margins by boosting production rates for commercial aircraft and securing better terms from suppliers, noting that some of them enjoy higher profitability than...

twitter.description: Boeing CEO suggests orders may come at Singapore Airshow.
